subject: Horses
Veterinary Medicine
Philanthropy
Horse Racing
Cruelty to Animals
lead_paragraph: The Thoroughbred Retirement Foundation’s primary benefactor said if the group wants to continue evaluating its herd of more than 1,000 horses, it must do so with its own money.
snippet: The Thoroughbred Retirement Foundation’s primary benefactor said if the group wants to continue evaluating its herd of more than 1,000 horses, it must do so with its own money.
